titleStmt.title: An exposition, and observations upon Saint Paul to the Galathians togither with incident quæstions debated, and motiues remoued, by Iohn Prime.
titleStmt.author: Prime, John, 1550-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes and are to be sold [by T. Cooke] in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Tygers head,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; title page torn, affecting imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Tygers head
